titleStmt.title: Regales aphorismi or a royal chain of golden sentences, divine, morall, and politicall, as at severall times, and on several occasions they were delivered by King James. Collected by certain reverend and honourable personages attending on his Majesty.
titleStmt.author: James I, King of England, 1566-1625.
Stratton, W., editor.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B.A. and are to be sold at his house near the upper pump in Grub-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
